targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({app="gateway-public", job="ceramic/http"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | status >= 200 and status < 300 | __error__!="LabelFilterErr" [$bucket]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({app="gateway-public", job="ceramic/http"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | status >= 300 and status < 400 | __error__!="LabelFilterErr" [$bucket]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({app="gateway-public", job="ceramic/http"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | status >= 400 and status < 500 | __error__!="LabelFilterErr" [$bucket]))

avg by (original_url) (avg_over_time({app="gateway-public", job="ceramic/http"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | __error__!=" SampleExtractionErr" |= "/api/v0" | unwrap elapsed_ms | __error__!="SampleExtractionErr" [$bucket]))

panels.description: Requests per origin per endpoint per $bucket, stacked
panels.title: Requests per Origin per Endpoint
